message.content:
Validate the guides UI components are SaaS-ready. Check:

1. **GuidesTab Component** (`src/components/results/tabs/GuidesTab.tsx`):
   - ProductCallout component renders affiliate links correctly
   - GuideViewer modal works with all guide sections
   - MediaRenderer handles all media types (image, gif, video)
   - Region-aware pricing displays correctly via useRegion hook

2. **Region Context** (`src/contexts/RegionContext.tsx`):
   - All 6 regions supported (us, uk, de, fr, au, asia)
   - Price formatting works for all currencies
   - Auto-detection logic is correct

3. **Type Safety** (`src/types/guides.ts`):
   - GuideProduct interface has all required fields
   - ProductCategory union includes all categories
   - Guide interface includes productIds array

4. **Index Exports** (`src/data/guides/index.ts`):
   - All guides are exported
   - All helper functions are exported
   - getGuideProductById, getGuideProductsByIds work correctly

Report any issues with component logic, missing error handling, or broken functionality.

content.text: I'll validate the guides UI components for SaaS-readiness. Let me start by reading the relevant files.
Now let me also check the products-registry and the region utility library:

    29â†’
    30â†’  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    31â†’    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    32â†’    if (asin) {
    33â†’      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    34â†’    }
    35â†’  });
    36â†’
    37â†’  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
    38â†’  if (asins.us) {
    39â†’    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
    40â†’  }
    41â†’
    42â†’  return links;
    43â†’}

/**
 * Product Registry for Guides System
 * 73 products with multi-region affiliate links and Ross-style taglines
 * Categories: hygiene, grooming, skincare, miscellaneous, supplements, hair, beard, teeth, kbeauty, hormonal, surgery
 */

import { GuideProduct, ProductCategory } from '@/types/guides';
import { buildAmazonUrl } from '@/lib/region';

// ============================================
// AMAZON ASIN MAPPING BY REGION
// ============================================

interface ProductASINs {
  us?: string;
  uk?: string;
  de?: string;
  fr?: string;
  au?: string;
}

// Regions that have Amazon stores with ASINs
type AmazonRegion = 'us' | 'uk' | 'de' | 'fr' | 'au';
const AMAZON_REGIONS: AmazonRegion[] = ['us', 'uk', 'de', 'fr', 'au'];

// Helper to build region links from ASINs
function buildRegionLinks(asins: ProductASINs): Record<string, string> {
  const links: Record<string, string> = {};

  AMAZON_REGIONS.forEach(region => {
    const asin = asins[region] || asins.us; // Fallback to US ASIN
    if (asin) {
      links[region] = buildAmazonUrl(asin, region);
    }
  });

  // Asia uses US ASIN on amzn.asia domain
  if (asins.us) {
    links['asia'] = buildAmazonUrl(asins.us, 'asia');
  }

  return links;
}

// ============================================
// PRODUCT DATABASE (33 Products)
// ============================================

export const GUIDE_PRODUCTS: GuideProduct[] = [
  // ============================================
  // HYGIENE (4 products)
  // ============================================
  {
    id: 'tongue_scraper',

    category: 'hygiene',
    tagline: "Your breath is out here committing war crimes and you don't even know it.",
    description: 'Medical-grade stainless steel tongue scraper. Removes bacteria and sulfur compounds that cause bad breath. Takes 10 seconds, lasts forever.',
    priority: 1,
    priceRange: { min: 7, max: 12, currency: 'USD' },
    regionLinks: buildRegionLinks({
      us: 'B091G5CH14',
      uk: 'B091G5CH14',
      de: 'B091G5CH14',
      fr: 'B091G5CH14',
      au: 'B091G5CH14',
    }),
    imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1609587312208-cea54be969e7?w=200&h=200&fit=crop',
    isBaseStack: true,
  },
  {
    id: 'cologne_bleu',
    name: 'Bleu de Chanel EDT',
    brand: 'Chanel',
    category: 'hygiene',
    tagline: "Stop smelling like your high school gym locker. This ain't Axe bodyspray era anymore.",
    description: 'Clean, versatile, universally liked. The safe choice that works for 99% of situations. Not cheap, but compliment-to-dollar ratio is unmatched.',
    priority: 2,
    priceRange: { min: 80, max: 150, currency: 'USD' },
    regionLinks: buildRegionLinks({
      us: 'B01N4P3WC3',
      uk: 'B01N4P3WC3',
      de: 'B01N4P3WC3',
      fr: 'B01N4P3WC3',
      au: 'B01N4P3WC3',
    }),
    imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1541643600914-78b084683601?w=200&h=200&fit=crop',
    isBaseStack: false,
  },
  {
    id: 'nitrile_gloves',
    name: 'Nitrile Examination Gloves',
    brand: 'Dealmed',
    category: 'hygiene',
    tagline: "For when you're touching your face with tretinoin hands. Your pillowcase will thank you.",
    description: 'Black nitrile gloves for skincare application. Prevents product waste and keeps actives off your hands.',
    priority: 3,
    priceRange: { min: 12, max: 20, currency: 'USD' },
    regionLinks: buildRegionLinks({
      us: 'B08BZNM84F',
      uk: 'B08BZNM84F',
      de: 'B08BZNM84F',
      fr: 'B08BZNM84F',
      au: 'B08BZNM84F',
    }),
    imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1584820927498-cfe5211fd8bf?w=200&h=200&fit=crop',
    isBaseStack: false,
  },
  {
    id: 'electric_toothbrush',
    name: 'Oral-B iO Series 5',
    brand: 'Oral-B',
    category: 'hygiene',
    tagline: "Manual toothbrush in 2024 is NPC behavior. Your teeth deserve better.",

// ============================================
// HELPER FUNCTIONS
// ============================================

/**
 * Product ID aliases for backwards compatibility
 * Maps shorthand IDs to full product IDs
 */
const PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES: Record<string, string> = {
  // Supplements
  ashwagandha: 'ashwagandha_ksm66',
  creatine: 'creatine_mono',
  omega_3: 'omega3_fish_oil',
  zinc: 'zinc_picolinate',
  // Add more as needed
};

/**
 * Get product by ID (supports aliases)
 */
export function getGuideProductById(id: string): GuideProduct | undefined {
  // Resolve alias if it exists
  const resolvedId = PRODUCT_ID_ALIASES[id] || id;
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.find(p => p.id === resolvedId);
}

/**
 * Get all products in a category
 */
export function getGuideProductsByCategory(category: ProductCategory): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.category === category)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get all base stack products (essentials for everyone)
 */
export function getBaseStackProducts(): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS
    .filter(p => p.isBaseStack)
    .sort((a, b) => a.priority - b.priority);
}

/**
 * Get products by priority level
 */
export function getGuideProductsByPriority(priority: number): GuideProduct[] {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.priority === priority);
}

/**
 * Get all unique categories with product counts
 */
export function getProductCategories(): Array<{ category: ProductCategory; count: number }> {
  const categories: ProductCategory[] = [
    'hygiene',
    'grooming',
    'skincare',
    'miscellaneous',
    'supplements',
    'hair',
    'beard',
    'teeth',
    'kbeauty',
    'hormonal',
    'surgery',
  ];

  return categories.map(category => ({
    category,
    count: GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p => p.category === category).length,
  }));
}

/**
 * Get products by array of IDs (preserves order)
 */
export function getGuideProductsByIds(ids: string[]): GuideProduct[] {
  return ids
    .map(id => getGuideProductById(id))
    .filter((p): p is GuideProduct => p !== undefined);
}

/**
 * Search products by name or description
 */
export function searchGuideProducts(query: string): GuideProduct[] {
  const lowered = query.toLowerCase();
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.filter(p =>
    p.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.description.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    p.tagline.toLowerCase().includes(lowered) ||
    (p.brand && p.brand.toLowerCase().includes(lowered))
  );
}

/**
 * Get total product count
 */
export function getTotalProductCount(): number {
  return GUIDE_PRODUCTS.length;
}

/**
 * Get category display info
 */
export function getCategoryDisplayInfo(category: ProductCategory): {
  name: string;
  icon: string;
  description: string;
} {
  const info: Record<ProductCategory, { name: string; icon: string; description: string }> = {
    hygiene: {
      name: 'Hygiene',
      icon: 'Sparkles',
      description: 'Fundamentals of not repelling people',
    },
    grooming: {
      name: 'Grooming',
      icon: 'Scissors',
      description: 'Tools for precision face maintenance',
    },
    skincare: {
      name: 'Skincare',
      icon: 'Droplet',
      description: 'Your skin is your face. Treat it right.',
    },
    miscellaneous: {
      name: 'Miscellaneous',
      icon: 'Package',
      description: 'The supporting cast of your glow-up',
    },
    supplements: {
      name: 'Supplements',
      icon: 'Pill',
      description: 'Fill the gaps your diet is missing',
    },
    hair: {
      name: 'Hair',
      icon: 'Wind',
      description: 'The Big 3 and beyondâ€”save what you have',
    },
    beard: {
      name: 'Beard',
      icon: 'User',
      description: 'Grow it, groom it, own it',
    },
    teeth: {
      name: 'Teeth',
      icon: 'Smile',
      description: 'Your smile is worth more than you think',
    },
    kbeauty: {
      name: 'K-Beauty',
      icon: 'Sparkle',
      description: 'Glass skin protocols from Seoul',
    },
    hormonal: {
      name: 'Hormonal',
      icon: 'Heart',
      description: 'PCOS, hormonal acne, and balance',
    },
    surgery: {
      name: 'Surgery',
      icon: 'Stethoscope',
      description: 'Post-op recovery essentials',
    },
  };

  return info[category];
}

Now I have all the information I need to compile the validation report. --- # QA Validation Report: Guides UI Components ## Overall Verdict: **PASS WITH ISSUES** The guides UI components are largely SaaS-ready with robust implementations for affiliate links, region detection, and content rendering. However, there are a few issues that should be addressed for production quality. --- ## Requirements Checklist ### 1. GuidesTab Component (`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/tabs/GuidesTab.tsx`) | Requirement | Status | Details | |-------------|--------|---------| | ProductCallout renders affiliate links correctly | **MET** | Uses `useRegion().getLink()` hook correctly (line 183). Handles missing products gracefully with `if (!product) return null` (line 181). | | GuideViewer modal works with all guide sections | **MET** | Properly renders sections with navigation (lines 854-896), section switching, progress tracking, and all content types (tips, warnings, media, products). | | MediaRenderer handles all media types | **PARTIALLY MET** | Handles `gif` and `image` types correctly (lines 135-156). **Video type is declared in types but NOT implemented in MediaRenderer.** | | Region-aware pricing displays correctly | **MET** | Uses `useRegion()` hook for `getLink()` function. Price formatting is available via `formatAmount` and `formatRange` methods. | ### 2. Region Context (`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/contexts/RegionContext.tsx`) | Requirement | Status | Details | |-------------|--------|---------| | All 6 regions supported | **MET** | Regions `us`, `uk`, `de`, `fr`, `au`, `asia` are all defined in `REGION_CONFIGS` (lines 22-77 of types file). | | Price formatting works for all currencies | **MET** | `formatPrice()` and `formatPriceRange()` functions handle all currencies (USD, GBP, EUR, AUD) with proper symbols. | | Auto-detection logic is correct | **MET** | Priority order is correct: localStorage -> navigator.language -> timezone -> default (lines 25-82 of region.ts). Handles partial locale matches and continent-based timezone fallbacks. | ### 3. Type Safety (`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/types/guides.ts`) | Requirement | Status | Details | |-------------|--------|---------| | GuideProduct interface has all required fields | **MET** | Contains: `id`, `name`, `brand?`, `category`, `tagline`, `description`, `priority`, `priceRange?`, `regionLinks`, `directLink?`, `imageUrl?`, `isBaseStack?` (lines 105-122). | | ProductCategory union includes all categories | **MET** | Includes 11 categories: `hygiene`, `grooming`, `skincare`, `miscellaneous`, `supplements`, `hair`, `beard`, `teeth`, `kbeauty`, `hormonal`, `surgery` (lines 83-94). | | Guide interface includes productIds array | **MET** | `productIds?: string[]` is defined on line 172. | ### 4. Index Exports (`/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/data/guides/index.ts`) | Requirement | Status | Details | |-------------|--------|---------| | All guides are exported | **MET** | 58+ guides exported across 13 categories. All imports and exports properly configured. | | All helper functions are exported | **MET** | Exports include: `getGuideById`, `getGuideBySlug`, `getGuidesByCategory`, `getRelatedGuides`, `searchGuides`, `getTotalGuideCount`, `getTotalReadTime`, `getAllGuideProductIds`, `getGuidesByGender`, `getCategoryById`, `getAllCategoryIds`. | | `getGuideProductById`, `getGuideProductsByIds` work correctly | **MET** | Both functions are exported from `products-registry.ts` and re-exported from index. `getGuideProductById` supports aliases for backwards compatibility. | --- ## Detailed Findings ### Issue 1: Video Media Type Not Implemented (Medium Priority) **File**: `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/tabs/GuidesTab.tsx` **Description**: The `MediaType` union in types includes `'video'`, but the `MediaRenderer` component only handles `gif` and `image` types. If a guide contains a video media item, it will be rendered as an image (fallback behavior). **Code Location**: Lines 79-164 of GuidesTab.tsx **Current Behavior**: ```typescript const isGif = media.type === 'gif' || media.url.endsWith('.gif'); // No check for media.type === 'video' ``` **Recommendation**: Add video rendering support: ```typescript if (media.type === 'video') { return ( ); } ``` --- ### Issue 2: No Loading State for ProductCallout Image (Low Priority) **File**: `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/components/results/tabs/GuidesTab.tsx` **Description**: The ProductCallout component has loading state logic but does not show the loading spinner until the condition `isLoading && !hasError && product.imageUrl` is met. This is functionally correct but could be simplified. **Code Location**: Lines 189-194 **Current Behavior**: Works correctly. No action required unless code simplification is desired. --- ### Issue 3: Fallback Link Returns `'#'` (Low Priority) **File**: `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/region.ts` **Description**: When no product links are available for any region and no direct link exists, the function returns `'#'` which is a non-functional link. **Code Location**: Line 161 **Current Behavior**: ```typescript return firstAvailable || '#'; ``` **Recommendation**: Consider logging a warning in development or returning a more informative fallback (e.g., a search URL for the product name). --- ### Issue 4: Price Formatting Does Not Convert Currencies (Low Priority) **File**: `/Users/imorgado/LOOKSMAXX/looksmaxx-app/src/lib/region.ts` **Description**: The `formatPrice()` function only adds the currency symbol - it does not convert USD prices to local currency equivalents. All products have prices defined in USD. **Code Location**: Lines 222-228 **Current Behavior**: A product with `priceRange: { min: 20, max: 30, currency: 'USD' }` will display as "20.00 - 30.00" regardless of region, but with the region's currency symbol (e.g., "20.00 - 30.00" for UK users). This could be confusing. **Recommendation**: Either: 1. Add currency conversion rates for display purposes 2. Clearly indicate "Prices in USD" when the product currency differs from user's region 3. Store prices in multiple currencies per product --- ## Quality Issues Beyond Requirements ### 1. ESLint Warnings (Info) The codebase has minor ESLint warnings (not related to guides): - Missing hook dependencies in `LandmarkAnalysisTool.tsx` - `` usage instead of `` in some components ### 2. TypeScript Compilation (Pass) TypeScript compilation passes with no errors. All types are properly defined and used. ### 3. Error Handling (Good) - `MediaRenderer` has proper error states with graceful fallback UI - `ProductCallout` handles missing products with early return - Region detection has try-catch blocks for localStorage and Intl API failures ### 4. Accessibility (Partial) - Alt text is properly passed to images - No ARIA labels on interactive elements in the guide navigation - Keyboard navigation not explicitly tested --- ## Recommendations Summary | Priority | Issue | Recommendation | |----------|-------|----------------| | **Medium** | Video media type not implemented | Add `
